name: The Other World (Kwago Games)
description:
You are a penguin. And you need to get your money back. But in order to do that, you may need to go to another world beyond others' reach...

This was my submission for the VimJam, where the focus was on collectables and the theme was "there and back". I had a lot of fun (and stress) making it. Hope you like it!
